title: Pornography
description:
Pornography has been blamed for destroying our minds and our sex lives. Some even say porn is addictive. But, what does the science say? To find out Wendy Zukerman speaks to Dr. Russell Pratt, Dr Simone KÃ¼hn, Prof. Brian McNair and anti-porn campaigner Gabriel Deem.
